text: Florin Vlăduț Popa (born 27 March 1996) is a Romanian rugby union player. He plays as a Centre for professional SuperLiga club Timișoara Saracens. Ioniță also plays for Romania's national team the Oaks. ==References== ==External links== * * * * * Florin Vlăduț Popa at Timișoara Saracens website Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian rugby union players Category:Romania international rugby union players Category:Timișoara Saracens players Category:Rugby union centres
title: Vlăduț Popa
